text: The 2015 12U Baseball World Cup is an under-12 international baseball tournament being held from July 23 to August 2 in Taipei City, Taiwan.2015 WBSC U-12 Baseball World Cup nations, dates announced == Teams == Twelve teams qualified for the tournament. The number in parentheses is their nations ranking in the WBSC World Rankings http://www.wbsc.org/rankings/ prior to the start of the tournament. {| class="wikitable" ! width="200" |Pool A ! width="200" |Pool B |- align="center" | | |- align="center" | | |- align="center" | | |- align="center" | | |- align="center" | | |- align="center" | | |} == First Round == === Group A === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !
